title: Getting started with door
text: door core shiny application statgarten EASY-data analysis. door consists 4 + 1 functions. Data Import Data Visualize (see colorpen) Data Profiling (see board) Statistical Data analysis (see soroban) Machine Learning (see stove) article, introduce Import (upload) dataset analysis. article based 0.1.7 Version door

title: Getting started with door
text: run door (door::run_app()) see image like .  Import part consisted 3 part. Language selection: can choose either english korean. (may support korean yet, let us know creating issue ) languages may added , soon. button designed guide (‚Äôs experimental, usable yet.) Type data: door supports 4 types. Files (Local). can upload PC‚Äôs file drag clicking Browse button. URL (Web). can paste URL data. Google Sheet. Also supported, must check data can access public. Datatoys. case don‚Äôt data, statgarten curated Public data Public data portal Republic Korea. information, visit datatoys repository Also type, different options.  Files, trip, encoding, decimal separator provided. door supports 13 type format.  URL, test data exists, (may removed version) door mainly utilize datamods data import, may interest datamods description Import module: changes user select type data. Experimental PART Guide  import module, ‚Äôs carousel-like component consider provide guide door user. ‚Äôs development process (may removed used).

title: Run the Shiny Application ‚Äî run_app
code: run_app(   onStart = NULL,   options = list(),   enableBookmarking = NULL,   uiPattern = "/",   ... )

title: Run the Shiny Application ‚Äî run_app
text: onStart function called app actually run. needed shinyAppObj, since shinyAppDir case, global.R file can used purpose. options Named options passed runApp call (can following: "port", "launch.browser", "host", "quiet", "display.mode" "test.mode"). can also specify width height parameters provide hint embedding environment ideal height/width app. enableBookmarking Can one "url", "server", "disable". default value, NULL, respect setting previous calls  enableBookmarking(). See enableBookmarking() information bookmarking app. uiPattern regular expression applied GET request determine whether ui used handle request. Note entire request path must match regular expression order match considered successful. ... arguments pass golem_opts. See `?golem::get_golem_options` details.
